This topic describes how to edit the model documentation by using the developer framework. This topic is relevant for model developers who want to view make qualitative edits to their model documentation.


## Prerequisites

* You are a registered user on the ValidMind platform
* The model is already [registered in the model inventory](register-models.qmd)
* A model developer has provided some content on the documentation, either using the Developer Framework or via the online UI editor
* You have already located the project identifier, API keuy and secret
* You have already initialized the Developer Framework for your model
* You are logged in to the ValidMind platform
